embeddedItem.name: Antimatter Field Generator
embeddedItem.desc: Upon use, increases ATK of all allies by <nobr>260</nobr> and CRIT Rate by 8% for the next battle.
embeddedItem.lore:
Despite being blessed by Nanook the Aeon and having the know-how of making a multitude of heavy weaponry, some members of the Antimatter Legion still prefer primitive non-firearms. The Voidrangers implant Antimatter Field Generators into their arms to form formidable Field Blades.

"Like a hot knife through butter."

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

440482.name: Strange Matter of Destruction
440482.lore:
Strange matter that seems to possess the power of destruction.
Resembling fire but not quite, it is neither cold nor hot and will damage anything that comes into contact with it for over 12 seconds.
Could be the Antimatter Legion's version of trash.

"Creatures that received blessing from Nanook all have twisted appearances."
comeFrom: Storage Zone: Voidranger: Reavers or other enemies

557157.name: Meteoric Alloy
557157.lore:
Resilient meteoric ironsand.
Its tenacity is far superior to solid boulders.

"Let's grab as much as we can. Qlipoth will need them."
"I have no idea whether the Aeon need them or not. All I know is that the IPC will pay big bucks for them."
comeFrom: Robot Settlement: Automatons or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in Jarilo-VI

988812.name: Recipe: Antimatter Field Generator
988812.desc: A simple equation. When entered into the Synthesizer, it will unlock a new recipe.
